epics.name: Core Architecture & Modular Foundations
epics.description: Set up Clean Architecture with MVVM, DI, multi-module Kotlin, static analysis, and profiling harness.

epics.name: Frictionless Google Sign-In & Account Lifecycle
epics.description: Implement one-tap Google login via Firebase/Credential Manager with backend session validation.

epics.name: CI/CD, Quality Gates & Release Automation
epics.description: Establish GitHub/GitLab CI/CD pipelines with Jira integration, tests, lint, detekt, and Play internal track deploy.

epics.name: Holistic Test Strategy & Quality Tooling
epics.description: Define TDD strategy with unit, integration, DAO, UI Compose tests, and coverage thresholds.

epics.name: Article & Media Ingestion + Storage Pipeline
epics.description: Build Node.js/TypeScript ingestion pipeline for ~4 .docx articles (~40 pages each, with images, audio, YouTube embeds), converting to HTML/text with full-text search and versioning.

epics.name: Client Delta Sync, Caching & Offline Integrity
epics.description: Implement manifest-driven delta sync, Room persistence, and offline caching with checksum verification and background sync.

epics.name: Observability & Telemetry Layer
epics.description: Integrate Firebase Crashlytics and Analytics for crash reporting and privacy-respecting usage tracking.

epics.name: Reading & Interactive Consumption Experience
epics.description: Deliver reader UI (Jetpack Compose, typography controls, media rendering, in-article search, pagination, reading progress) with light/dark themes, multi-window/large screen layouts, and reading statistics.

epics.name: Bookmarking & Personal Library Organization
epics.description: Implement bookmark saving, folder organization, global full-text search, article tagging, and rule-based recommendations.

epics.name: Private Annotations & Personal Discussions
epics.description: Enable private text/media-anchored annotations, discussion threads with text/image/audio/PDF attachments, notifications, and in-app update notices for manifest schema changes.

epics.name: Documentation, Developer Experience & OSS
epics.description: Create open-source documentation (README, contribution guide, ADR, OpenAPI contract, content authoring guide).

epics.name: Minimal Admin Operations UI
epics.description: Build Node.js/TypeScript-based admin web UI for content ingestion queue and user support view.

epics.name: Internationalization & Localization Readiness
epics.description: Prepare string externalization, RTL support, and language metadata toggle stub.

epics.name: Usability, Accessibility & Polish
epics.description: Ensure WCAG compliance (scalable text, contrast, TalkBack, heading semantics) and in-app settings for theme, text size, analytics opt-in/out.

epics.name: Performance & Runtime Optimization
epics.description: Optimize Compose rendering, memory usage, and app performance for ~4 articles.

epics.name: Store Listing & Policy Readiness
epics.description: Prepare Play Store assets and compliance for app launch.

sprints.name: Sprint 1: Foundation Setup
sprints.goal: Set up Clean Architecture, Google login, CI/CD with Jira integration, and TDD framework to enable robust Android development.

sprints.name: Sprint 2: Content Backend
sprints.goal: Build Node.js ingestion pipeline with full-text search and client sync for ~4 articles with media.

sprints.name: Sprint 3: Security & Observability
sprints.goal: Ensure secure data handling and integrate production-grade telemetry for monitoring.

sprints.name: Sprint 4: Core Features
sprints.goal: Deliver reader UI with in-article search, bookmarking with global full-text search, and private discussion threads with in-app and push notifications.

sprints.name: Sprint 5: Docs & Admin Ops
sprints.goal: Create open-source documentation and Node.js-based admin UI for managing content ingestion and user discussions.

sprints.name: Sprint 6: Polish & Release
sprints.goal: Finalize internationalization, usability, performance optimizations, and Play Store assets for app launch.

Stories.summary: Integrate telemetry for crash and analytics monitoring
Stories.description: As a developer, I need crash reporting and analytics telemetry to monitor app performance and user interactions without sensitive data.

Stories.summary: Set up Crashlytics and Analytics SDK
Stories.description: Integrate Firebase Crashlytics and Analytics SDK for crash reporting and event tracking.

Stories.summary: Define event taxonomy and logging strategy
Stories.description: Create a neutral event taxonomy and logging strategy avoiding sensitive personal data.
Set up performance traces for key app operations in telemetry system.
Create documentation for telemetry dashboard setup and usage.
